dict.acceptation: 批评，批判；鉴定，审定，考证，校勘；苛求，[哲]批判主义；评论，评论文章；

sent.orig: A Communist must be bold in criticism and self-criticism.
sent.trans: 共产党必须勇于批评和自我批评。

sent.orig: Criticism and self-criticism is necessary in that is helps us to correct our mistakes.
sent.trans: 批评和自我批评是必要的，因为它能帮助我们改正错误。

sent.orig: Many comrades have undertaken self-criticism; with unity as the objective unity has been achieved through self-criticism.
sent.trans: 许多同志作了自我批评，从团结的目标出发，经过自我批评，达到了团结。

sent.orig: The chief method for dealing with this confusion remains criticism and self-criticism.
sent.trans: 解决思想战线混乱问题的主要方法，仍然是开展批评和自我批评。

sent.orig: Instead of dragging up their past disputes the two parties achieved unity through criticism and self-criticism.
sent.trans: 双方没有纠缠老帐，而是通过批评与自我批评加强了团结。
